title: cultural_data_KHM_Stories_-_Experience_Kunsthistorisches_Museum
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.vienom.khm.kunstvermittlung.
Application Name: KHM Stories - Experience Kunsthistorisches Museum.
Number of Reviews: 281.00.
Application Description: Rediscover the diversity of our collections through interactive tours on topics like “love” or “magic”! Your smartphone guides you to famous and hidden works of art and let you look at them as if through a magnifying glass. See the backside of works, views from the inside or x-ray images which would otherwise be hidden and sharpen your eyes for the details. Interactive elements make the originals even more exciting and build bridges from the past to the present. Let yourself be informed, surprised and entertained- and, most important: Take part!!Here it goes – 9 Tours already available and waiting for youFeatures: * Total of 9 tours * Children’s tours starting from age 8 * Interactive elements * German, English, Turkish and BCS (Bosnian, Croatian and Serbo-Croatian) * Navigation through the museum * Barrier-free access availableRead .
Number of Characters in Description: 845.00.
Overall Rate: 4.40.
First Page Reviews: An interesting way to visit a museum. I followed a tour through and it was a delight... for the most part. Some details in the app are a matter of taste and some objects had been moved. Keeping tours updated with artwork locations in the museum seems like a long-term task. Not useful as guide. It's not possible to find item by name or number. You have to only follow thematic tour. Why?! Very well put together tour, very interesting background information. A few glitches with the app though, where some of the audio files don't play. Really good tours that inspire you to spend more time with the art and artefacts..
Number of Characters in First Page Reviews: 619.00.
Last Update: 11/09/2019.
Ending Date: 19/03/2021.
Number of Days Since Last Update: 555.00.
App Size: 54.00.
App Installs: 10000.00.
 Version Required: 4.40.
